participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

path_nic_dep_q01_l.Description: How soon after you wake up do you want to use tobacco? | 1 = Within 5 minutes; 2 = From 6 to 30 minutes; 3 = From more than 30 minutes to 1 hour; 4 = After more than 1 hour but less than 24 hours; 5 = I rarely want to use tobacco / xskipout_tob_l   == '1'

Levels.3: From more than 30 minutes to 1 hour
Levels.4: After more than 1 hour but less than 24 hours
Levels.5: I rarely want to use tobacco

path_nic_dep_q02_l.Description: Do you ever have strong craving to use tobacco? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No / xskipout_tob_l   == '1'

path_nic_dep_q03_l.Description: Have you ever felt like you really needed to use tobacco? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No / xskipout_tob_l   == '1'

path_nic_dep_q04_l.Description: I find myself reaching for a tobacco product without thinking about it. | 1 = Not true of me at all1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = 4; 5 = Extremely true of me5 / xskipout_tob_l   == '1'

Levels.1: Not true of me at all1

path_nic_dep_q05_l.Description: I frequently crave tobacco. | 1 = Not true of me at all1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = 4; 5 = Extremely true of me5 / xskipout_tob_l   == '1'

Levels.1: Not true of me at all1

path_nic_dep_q06_l.Description: My tobacco use is out of control. | 1 = Not true of me at all1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = 4; 5 = Extremely true of me5 / xskipout_tob_l   == '1'

Levels.1: Not true of me at all1

path_nic_dep_q07_l.Description: Using tobacco really helps me feel better if I've been feeling down. | 1 = Not true of me at all1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = 4; 5 = Extremely true of me5 / xskipout_tob_l   == '1'

Levels.1: Not true of me at all1

path_nic_dep_q08_l.Description: Using tobacco helps me think better. | 1 = Not true of me at all1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = 4; 5 = Extremely true of me5 / xskipout_tob_l   == '1'

Levels.1: Not true of me at all1

path_nic_dep_q09_l.Description: I would feel alone without my tobacco. | 1 = Not true of me at all1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = 4; 5 = Extremely true of me5 / xskipout_tob_l   == '1'

Levels.1: Not true of me at all1

path_nic_dep_q10_l.Description: I usually want to use my tobacco right after I wake up. | 1 = Not true of me at all1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = 4; 5 = Extremely true of me5 / xskipout_tob_l   == '1'

Levels.1: Not true of me at all1

su_nic_admin.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1=RA-Administered ; 2=Youth Self_Administered ; 3=Combination [sched_delay] = '7'
